DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare efficacy Paclitaxel-eluting PTCA-balloon dilation ( SeQuentTM Please ) follow cobalt-chromium stent ( CoroflexTM Blue ) deployment versus Paclitaxel-eluting stent ( TaxusTM LibertéTM ) deployment treatment de-novo-stenoses native coronary artery ( reference diameter : 2.5 mm 3.5 mm , length stenosis ≥ 10 mm ≤ 20 mm ) patient diabetes mellitus ≥ 3 year procedural success preservation vessel patency . This study prospective , randomize , multi-center , two-armed phase-II pilot study conduct Malaysia Thailand . 128 diabetes mellitus patient shall complete study per protocol random assignment either treatment group order 20 50 patient per center . Diabetes mellitus patient stable select form unstable angina document ischemia due de-novo stenosis native coronary artery enrol . Vessels may supply entirely infarcted myocardial area . Late lumen loss 9 month primary endpoint .
DOC.brief_title: Paclitaxel Eluting Balloon Versus Drug Eluting Stent Native Coronary Artery Stenoses Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: History diabetes mellitus least 3 yrs prior enrollment . Diabetes mellitus may treat either orally s.c . Stable blood glucose level 6 month precede enrollment reflect HbA1c concentration measure exclusively ≤ 8 % Patients stable angina pectoris ( CCS class 13 ) unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald class 12 , AC ) document ischemia document silent ischemia Patients eligible coronary revascularization mean PCI Women childbearing potential may pregnant desire become pregnant first year follow study procedure . Patient 's serum creatinine level must document Post transplantation organ immune suppressive medication Other disease jeopardize followup ( e.g. , malignancy ) Addiction drug alcohol Patients type surgery week precede interventional procedure .
